meanings.definition: The quality of being tastelessly showy or flashy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The gaudiness of her outfit made everyone stare.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with gaudiness, from the bright colors to the shiny decorations.
meanings.sent3: Despite the gaudiness of the cake, it tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: The gaudiness of the jewelry reflected her extravagant personality.
meanings.sent5: The gaudiness of the fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: Excessive or garish ornamentation or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The gaudiness of the Christmas tree overwhelmed the small room.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the gaudiness of the neon sign outside her window.
meanings.sent3: The gaudiness of the clown's costume made the children burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The gaudiness of the painting clashed with the simplicity of the room.
meanings.sent5: The gaudiness of the parade floats captured the attention of everyone along the street.
